gemini.instruction: Draft a technical specification for TD-066: Simulation God Class Refactoring. Goal: Decompose the 900+ LoC Simulation class (simulation/engine.py) into specialized managers following the SoC (Separation of Concerns) principle. Recommended Components: 1) TickScheduler: Handles the time loop and system update sequencing. 2) WorldState: Manages agent registries and global snapshots. 3) PersistenceManager: Handles DB flushing and serialization. 4) AgentLifecycleManager: Manages agent creation, death, and IPO/SEO triggers. Strict Requirements: Maintain backward compatibility with app.py/main.py entry points, use DTOs for inter-component state passing, and ensure 100% test pass for Phase 29 scenarios. Follow design/manuals/spec_writer.md.

jules.title: WO-083C-P1: Low Risk Test Migration
jules.instruction: Execute WO-083C Phase 1: Migrate 'tests/simulation/test_stock_market.py' and 'tests/api/test_api_extensions.py' to use Golden Fixtures. Refer to 'design/work_orders/WO-083C-P1-Low-Risk.md' for details. DO NOT modify production code.

git_review.instruction: Analyze this PR. Check behavior logic and test coverage.
